feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Fiori
feed.subtitle: SAP Fiori Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: how to use forceGlobalRefresh for adaptation project in Manifest_appdescr filehow to use forceGlobal
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I'm working on an adaptation project which was previously using SAPUI5 version 1.96. Following an upgrade the SAPUI5 version changed to 1.130, after the upgrade forceGlobalRefresh is set defaults to false (as per the behavior introduced in version 1.106).

I need to explicitly enable forceGlobalRefresh for the application, but adding the property directly to the manifest_appdescr.json file using the following configuration does not appear to have any effect:

{
     "changeType": "appdescr_ui_generic_app_setSettings",
     "content": {
                              "settings": {
                              "draftEnabled": true,
                              "forceGlobalRefresh": true
                          }
     }
}

 

Any suggestion or solution to fix this will be greatly appreciated.

 

 

SAPUI5

entry.title: Multi-tenant CAP app with Fiori
entry.content:
Hi,

I am trying to explore the simplest multi-tenant CAP app using the samples. It has the bookshop backend and two frontend apps named browse and admin.

I have deployed the multi tenant app and can subscribe and view data accessing the backend API. But I am not able to access the Fiori Apps. It gives me the error saying 'File not found'.

The easiest way to replicate the same is using the template wizard for CAP.

Now, the app is deployed and subscribed from other subaccount. The service endpoint is accessible:

But the Fiori endpoint throws error:

What could be the issue here? Any help is highly appreciated.

entry.title: Custom FIORI notification while (MIR7)
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I would like to receive a Fiori notification when an invoice is parked using transaction MIR7, without triggering any approval workflow.

Does anyone know the necessary configuration steps to achieve this?

Thanks in advance !

entry.title: Fiori - supplier Evaluation - No data available
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

I am using standard Fiori app F1663A, F1661A, F1664A and F2019. If we execute the app always, we receive no data available.

Odata services were also activated but data was not extracted. kindly help to resolve this issues.

entry.title: Handler for Button not called in adaptation
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

I try to extend a standard App "Create maintenance request" (F1511A). I have added a Fragment with button and the button is available:

My Fragment look like this:

<core:FragmentDefinition xmlns:core='sap.ui.core' xmlns='sap.m'>
    <Button id='LorCapBtn' text="LorCap" press='extension.customer.create.notif.variant.onLorCapPress'/> 
</core:FragmentDefinition>

The controller:

sap.ui.define(
    [
        'sap/ui/core/mvc/ControllerExtension'
        ,'sap/m/MessageBox'
        // ,'sap/ui/core/mvc/OverrideExecution'
    ],
    function (
        ControllerExtension
        ,MessageBox
        // ,OverrideExecution
    ) {
        'use strict';
        return ControllerExtension.extend("customer.create.notif.variant.MainCntrlExt", {
            onLorCapPress : function(oEvent){
                console.log("onLorCapPress called");
                MessageBox.success("Hello");
            },
});
    }
);

When I press the button nothing happened (no massege box, no message in console).

Do you know what is the problem? What have to be done to run my code?

Regards,

Boguslaw

entry.title: How to Enable "Run as SAP Fiori Launchpad Sandbox" in SAP Business Application Studio?
entry.content: In SAP Web IDE, there was a convenient option called "Run as SAP Fiori Launchpad Sandbox" that allowed us to quickly test Fiori apps in a standalone sandbox environment. I'm currently using SAP Business Application Studio (BAS), and I can't find an equivalent feature.

entry.title: Alternative to ME61
entry.content:
I am searching for a Alternative to ME61, where I can maintain the key. Via Fiori App I found no way to do this.

I need a alternative because of the sap note: 2267414 - S4TWL - Vendor evaluation based on LIS - SAP for Me

2228247 - S/4HANA Simplification: Deprecation of Vendor evaluation based on LIS - SAP for Me

entry.title: The navigation button of PO line item does not refer the user directly to Service Entry Sheet
entry.content:
Hello,

We have set up a custom Situation Object, Scenario, Template and Types to monitor missing Goods Receipts or Service Entry Sheets in relation to the delivery dates on PO line items.

However, the navigation button in the notification currently does not take the user directly to the Service Entry Sheet maintenance screen within the Manage Service Entry Sheets – Lean Services app (App ID: F2027). In contrast, for Goods Receipts, it is possible to achieve the desired behavior by navigating directly to the maintenance screen of the Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document app (App ID: F0843) or Post Goods Receipt (App ID: MIGO_GR).

Could you please advise on the expected system behavior and if it is possible to change the behavior to be more user-friendly?

Thank you and regards,

Dmitriy

entry.title: Flexible Programming Model Explorer - Building Blocks with Variant Management
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We have an interesting problem.

We developed a SAP Custom Page and Building Blocks ODatav4 and use macros:VariantManagement for Change Documents following the provided instructions?(Building Blocks with Variant Management)

The app show one error message: The "VariantManagement" class doesn't exist in the "sap.fe.macros" namespace.

 

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

entry.title: Flexible Programming Model Explorer - Building Block FilterBar doesn't have Variant Management
entry.content:
Dear Community,

I am using Flexible Programming Model to build my custom page. And I have used sap.fe.macros.Table to build my list report table and sap.fe.macros.FilterBar to build my Filter Bar and had linked both. I need to enable Variant Management out of box similar to my Fiori Elements List Report Apps, but I can see the Variant management option available only for the table and not for the Filter.

Using 'Page' as a value to Variant Management in table macro also doesn't work and only Control value works and enables Variant management only for my table. Hence my Filter is left out.

Is there anything I am missing? any standard alternative available?

entry.title: My Timesheet V4 - On Behalf functionality
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am currently working with the My Timesheet v4 application and am in the need of enabling the "on behalf" functionality. I found this note SAP for Me (2898805) and it seems is applicable for V3 only. Is there a way to do the same for the V4?

Any help would be appreicated!

Br,
Aleks.

entry.title: @ui.lineitem criticality not working in extension view for C_ContrItemMonitoring (Appid F2423 )
entry.content:
HI All,

We have a requirement to highlight the Purchase Contract Validity Status column value based on validity status. 

I have extended the CDS view  C_ContrItemMonitoring  and added the same PurchaseContractValidityStatus element with different alias and added @ui.lineitem.criticality property to the new element mapped the criticality value to the element.

The consumption CDS view C_ContrItemMonitoring dont have annotation @metadata.extensions.allowed true so I added the criticality extension in the extension view.

But in the fiori app the new column is coming but the value is not getting highlighted as per the criticality value.

I checked the configuration and found that he data to the Fiori app is coming through ODATA project which in turn uses the consumption view as data source inside the odata project.

The define method in dpc_ext has been redefined by SAP for specific requirement and the the Fiori app also has local annotation file.

Since the local annotation file has more priority than abap cds annotations, is this the reason why the criticality annotation is not working or am I doing anything wrong ?

What is the best approach in these type of scenarios . any alternate ways to achieve this functionality.

Best regards

Pawan

entry.title: Course to Learn SAP Free Style Fiori App
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm a full-stack developer with a solid programming background, and I've been learning SAP Fiori for about a month. I already understand the basics — what Fiori is and how it works.
Now, I want to go deeper and focus on Free Style Fiori app development. I'm looking for a course or resource (on learning.sap.com, Udemy, or any other platform) that teaches how to build a Free Style Fiori app from scratch — ideally with hands-on, real-world examples.
In particular, I’d like to learn more about:

  • How to add custom buttons anywhere on the page
  • How to bind fragments to controllers
  • How to call controller methods from fragments and views
  • And generally go deeper into real-world app structure and development practices

If you have any recommendations for structured learning paths, projects, or tutorials, I’d really appreciate your guidance.
Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Accessing Standard-Fiori App in Mobile
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I would like to make a standard SAP Fiori application accessible on a mobile device. My goal is to expose this app as a mobile application, but without utilizing SAP BTP. Since it is a standard app, I would prefer to achieve this solely using the Fiori Launchpad and user credentials. However SAP Start needs BTP excess to make this.

Could you please suggest any other possible approaches or best practices to make this feasible?

entry.title: Restrict the app F2175 Find Maintenance Order to show orders that an user is responsible for
entry.content:
Hello Everyone - I would like to restrict the orders displayed in the app, F2175 (Find Maintenance Order). I searched in SAP Community and could not find helpful information. Any pointers on how this can be achieved would be of great help.

Steps:

Access the app from launchpad

Clicking on the GO button should display only orders that I am responsible for.

I know we can do "Adapt Filters" and restrict on our personnel number. But this is a user specific setting. I want to restrict based on "Personnel Number" entered.

Thanks,

Phani

entry.title: Reported By doesn't show all users in Request Maintenance App (F1511)
entry.content:
Hello,

When we try to create a "Request Maintenance" using the Request Maintenance App (F1511), my user does not appear in the "Reported By" field. I do have a user account in the S/4HANA environment. We have tried creating an HR Master Record (PA30) and also set up a Business Partner (BP), but none of these steps have resolved the issue.

We are performing this validation in our development system as part of a new EAM project implementation. In the development environment, HR Master data is not synchronized with SuccessFactors, so we do not have access to all HR Master records. For this reason, we are attempting to create users manually.

Any guidance or pointers on how to resolve this would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you,
Phani

entry.title: How to use $top and $skip bindList in OData V4
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We have an interesting problem.

We developed a  Web Page ODatav4 and use bindList to Read OData V4.  Howerver, I don't use $top and $skip in mParameters.

Can you help me how to use $top and $skip in Odata V4?

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you!

entry.title: How do we change the SCMON job execution to run for a specific period of days?
entry.content:
Hi Community,

The SCMON is configured in our ABAP system and the report is being generated with the proper objects. How can we run the job one time for a period of 400 days? Additionally, what are the differences between a one-time run and a continuous run with respect to the results produced?
